headline: Microchip Technology to Present at the Wells Fargo 9th Annual TMT Summit
summary: CHANDLER, Ariz., Nov. 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- (NASDAQ:MCHP) – Microchip Technology Incorporated, a leading provider of smart, connected, and secure embedded control solutions, today announced that the Company will present at the Wells Fargo 9th Annual TMT Summit on Tuesday, November 18, 2025 at 12:45 p.m. (Pacific Time). Presenting for the Company will be Mr. Eric Bjornhoolt, Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officers, and Mr. Sajid Daudi, Head of Investor Relations. A live webcast

headline: Microchip Tech (MCHP) Reliance on International Sales: What Investors Need to Know
summary: Review Microchip Tech's (MCHP) international revenue performance and how it affects the predictions of financial analysts on Wall Street and the future prospects for the stock.
